title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: March 28, 2023, 06:23:27 AMLast edit: March 28, 2023, 06:34:13 AM by cafter
content: Can we keep malicious data in a block instead of transaction data/ledgerwhat will happen if done, works fine ? and does number of transaction per sec stays constant ? like bitcoin 7transaction per second. how do we calculate TPS ?

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: you can place ANY data in the blocks, ever since ordinals was made. But it's not particularly recommended dot do so around here as it's frowned upon.
